    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Faster Payment System (FPS) lets you make free<sup><a href="#1"><span aria-hidden="true">1</span><span class="visuallyhidden">1 View footnote 1</span></a></sup> instant HKD/ RMB transfers to people and merchants in Hong Kong via HSBC Online Banking and HSBC HK App without needing their bank account details in Hong Kong. Generate your own FPS QR code to have others pay you, or get paid via your mobile number, email address or anonymous FPS Identifier. You can also receive payments and transfers via your Hong Kong ID number, from institutions, corporates and the HKSAR government.<br> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">FPS is now available even outside of Hong Kong. You can place instructions in your e-CNY wallet app for top-up using your HSBC account or pay for your purchases instantly by scanning 'PromptPay' QR codes of supported merchants in Thailand with HSBC HK App.</p>

    <section class="sm-12 accordion-with-title O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV">
        
    
    <h2 class="A-BBST28R-RW-ALL">Top 5 frequently asked questions</h2>

    </section>
    <div id="content_main_accordion_1" class="accordions-container sm-12">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_1" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="2099366563__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="2099366563__tab0" class="dropdown-text">What is FPS? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="2099366563__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_5">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_6" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_3" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">FPS is a payment service platform that allows you to make instant payments to individuals and merchants in Hong Kong dollar (HKD) or Renminbi (RMB) via HSBC Online and Mobile Banking. It is available 24/7 and free of charge*, covering participating local banks, financial institutions with Stored Value Facility (SVF) licenses. You can also top up your e-CNY wallet or pay designated overseas merchants instantly.<br> <br> Traditional fund transfers require the payee’s bank account number, but FPS supports payments made using the payee’s mobile number, email address, FPS Identifier or Hong Kong ID number. FPS also enables you with a QR code to receive payments (registration of FPS and activation of Mobile Security Key is required to generate the QR code). You can also receive payments and transfers from institutions, corporates and the HKSAR government via your Hong Kong ID number.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><sup>*</sup><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">There is no charge from us if you pay money to, or receive money from accounts from other banks via FPS, but other banks may have different charging policies.</span></p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_2" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="1403902608__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="1403902608__tab0" class="dropdown-text">Why was my payment to a registered payee rejected? It worked before.  </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="1403902608__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_6">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_7" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_4" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">As FPS transfers are instant, many banks may have imposed stricter controls in place to make sure the recipient's name and bank account number match. If you are transferring via account number and you've used a nickname to add this person to 'My payees', the payment will be rejected.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Please ask your payee for the exact name the account is registered under. You'll then need to remove them from 'My payees' and add them again using their official name listed on their bank records.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Please note that you don't need to do this if your payee has registered for FPS and you have saved them to 'My payees' using one of their Proxy IDs (mobile number, email address and FPS Identifier).</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_3" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="711810667__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="711810667__tab0" class="dropdown-text">How to check the default receiving bank/ FPS participant of my Proxy ID? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="711810667__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_7">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_8" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_5" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can check your Proxy ID’s default receiving bank/ FPS participant on the HSBC HK Mobile Banking app. Simply select your profile in the top right corner, go to 'Pay and transfer‘ and choose 'Register or view FPS registration'. Then select the Proxy ID that you wish to check under the ‘Other FPS registrations’.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Alternatively, you can check it in HSBC Online Banking by going to ‘Register or view FPS registrations‘ under the ‘Pay & transfer’ menu, then select ‘View FPS registrations at other banks’ to check the default receiving bank/ FPS participant of your Proxy ID.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_4" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="-1235825165__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="-1235825165__tab0" class="dropdown-text">Someone tried to transfer money to me but HSBC rejected the payment. They successfully sent me money before, so why was it rejected this time? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-1235825165__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_8">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_9" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_6" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Because FPS transfers are instant, we are putting stricter controls in place to make sure the recipient's name and bank account number match. If someone is transferring money to you via account number and they've used a nickname to register you in their system, the payment will be rejected.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">To send money via your account number, this person will need to use the official name that your account is registered under. If you're unsure what that is, you can check your bank statement.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Alternatively, you can register for FPS to receive money via Proxy ID (mobile number, email address and/or FPS Identifier), so the person won't have to enter your name.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_5" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="1209113819__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="1209113819__tab0" class="dropdown-text">When I send money to someone, will I know if the transaction was successful? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="1209113819__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_9">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_10" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_7" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If your transaction is successful, you will receive an SMS and email notification. The record will also show in your transaction history.<br> </p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><sup>1</sup> <a id="footnotes"></a><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">There is no charge from us if you pay money to, or receive money from accounts from other banks via FPS, but other banks may have different charging policies.</span></p>

<p class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL"> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">HSBC adopts the latest internet security measure with the adoption of EV SSL Certificate (Extended Validation SSL Certificate). For more tips on internet security, please <a href="/misc/privacy-security/" target="_self">click here</a>.</p>
